statements: SELECT * FROM crm_marketing_integration ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_name, lead_source FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_amount FROM crm_marketing_integration ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 AND purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE lead_source = 'Online Ad' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_date FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE email IS NULL OR lead_source = 'Referral';
SELECT DISTINCT purchase_date, customer_name FROM crm_marketing_integration WHERE purchase_amount < 500 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crm_data;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM crm_data WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM marketing_analytics WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, clicks, impressions FROM marketing_analytics ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM crm_data;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM crm_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks FROM marketing_analytics WHERE impressions > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM crm_data WHERE address LIKE '%Park%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, campaign_name, clicks, impressions FROM marketing_analytics WHERE clicks >= 50 AND impressions < 500 ORDER BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerData ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number, address FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM MarketingData WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, campaign_name, interaction_date FROM CustomerData JOIN InteractionHistory ON CustomerData.customer_id = InteractionHistory.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, address FROM CustomerData;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingData ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InteractionHistory WHERE interaction_type='click' AND interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT CustomerData.customer_id, CustomerData.customer_name, InteractionHistory.interaction_date FROM CustomerData JOIN InteractionHistory ON CustomerData.customer_id = InteractionHistory.customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT InteractionHistory.customer_id) AS total_customers, COUNT(DISTINCT InteractionHistory.campaign_id) AS total_campaigns FROM InteractionHistory;
SELECT * FROM crm_customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM crm_customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM crm_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crm_customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM crm_customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM crm_interactions WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT customer_id, conversion_rate FROM campaign_results WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' ORDER BY last_name DESC, customer_id
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT orders.order_id, customers.first_name, products.product_name FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.total_amount > products.price

SELECT customers.first_name, interactions.interaction_date, marketing_campaigns.campaign_name FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id LEFT JOIN marketing_campaigns ON interactions.interaction_type = marketing_campaigns.campaign_name
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
